meanings.definition: The state or status of being a megastar.
meanings.sent1: Her dream was to achieve megastardom in the music industry.
meanings.sent2: After years of hard work, she finally reached megastardom.
meanings.sent3: The cat's meow was so loud that it achieved megastardom in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: His talent for painting propelled him into the realm of megastardom.
meanings.sent5: The bright lights of megastardom blinded her to the simple joys of life.

meanings.definition: The quality or characteristic of being extremely famous or successful.
meanings.sent1: His megastardom brought him wealth and recognition worldwide.
meanings.sent2: The actress's megastardom made her a household name.
meanings.sent3: The dog's ability to balance treats on its nose reached megastardom levels.
meanings.sent4: In the world of fashion, her style reached megastardom heights.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's dedication and hard work led to his megastardom in the sports industry.
